description: This file defines a React functional component 'TopNav' that renders the top navigation bar for the Cinemadrops frontend. It includes brand logo, search input, navigation links, and action buttons for chat, notifications, and quick actions.

methods.name: TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the top navigation bar with brand, search, and quick actions.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick }) {$/
